caseStudies.sectionDescription: Deep dive into real projects I've delivered. See the challenges, solutions, and results achieved for my clients.

layandent.title: LayandDent - Dental E-Commerce Platform
layandent.subtitle: Leading Saudi dental supplies company
layandent.problem: LayandDent needed a modern e-commerce platform to showcase and sell dental equipment and supplies to healthcare professionals across Saudi Arabia.
layandent.solution: Developed a comprehensive e-commerce solution with product catalog, inventory management, user authentication, and payment integration.

amwall.title: Amwall - Financial Consulting Platform
amwall.subtitle: Business consultant for foreign companies in Turkey
amwall.problem: Amwall needed a professional platform to showcase their financial and tax consulting services for foreign companies operating in Turkey.
amwall.solution: Created a modern, professional website with service showcases, client portal, and multilingual support for Turkish and English speakers.

storeIt.title: Store It - File Management Platform
storeIt.subtitle: Cloud-based file upload and management solution
storeIt.problem: Users needed a secure, easy-to-use platform for uploading, managing, and sharing files with advanced security features and user authentication.
storeIt.solution: Built a comprehensive file management system with drag-and-drop uploads, folder organization, sharing capabilities, and robust security.

liveDoc.title: Live Documentation Platform
liveDoc.subtitle: Real-time collaborative document editing
liveDoc.problem: Teams needed a platform for creating, editing, and sharing documents in real-time with multiple collaborators.
liveDoc.solution: Developed a real-time document collaboration platform with live editing, commenting, and sharing features.

cta.title: Interested in Similar Results?
cta.description: Every project is unique, but the approach remains consistent: understanding your needs, crafting the right solution, and delivering exceptional results.

timeline.sectionDescription: Explore my career timeline and the key projects I've worked on throughout my professional journey. Each project represents a milestone in my growth as a software engineer.

quote.text: Success is not just about the numbers, but about the impact we create and the problems we solve. Every line of code, every project, and every satisfied client represents a step forward in this journey.

getInTouch.description: I'm always open to discussing new opportunities, interesting projects, and creative challenges. Whether you're a startup looking to build your first app or an established company seeking to modernize your systems, I'm here to help.
